name: Bamar Music
description: Music of the Bamar people, the majority ethnic group of Myanmar.

children.name: Bamar Folk Music

children.name: Burmese Classical Music
children.description: Traditional court music of Myanmar, developed from Southeast Asian, Hindu and Chinese influences.

children.name: Mono
children.description: Employs Burmese melodies and modes of singing accompanied by Western instrumentation.
